articles.description: Watch live coverage and follow text and radio commentary as London Spirit host Oval Invincibles in the 2023 Men's Hundred.
articles.title: The Hundred: London Spirit v Oval Invincibles - watch, listen & follow text

articles.description: Manchester City agree a £77m deal with German club RB Leipzig for 21-year-old Croatia defender Josko Gvardiol.
articles.title: Man City agree £77m fee for Leipzig defender Gvardiol

articles.description: Debutant Shaheen Afridi takes wickets with his first two balls in The Hundred as Welsh Fire beat Manchester Originals in a rain-shortened game.
articles.title: Shaheen stars as Fire beat Originals in rain-hit game

articles.description: Lauren James has become an overnight sensation but dad Nigel tells BBC Sport he is not surprised at her success for England at the Women's World Cup.
articles.title: James 'not surprised' by daughter Lauren's impressive World Cup form

articles.description: Former Italy goalkeeper Gianluigi Buffon retires from professional football aged 45.
articles.title: Italy legend Buffon retires aged 45

articles.description: Watch as a fan in the crowd drops a catch from Welsh Fire Luke Wells' six during their Hundred match against Manchester Originals in Cardiff.
articles.title: Watch: Fan agonises after dropping catch in crowd

articles.description: Watch South Africa score in the dying seconds to earn a dramatic 48-48 draw with New Zealand at the Netball World Cup.
articles.title: 'Wow!' South Africa score in last second to tie with NZ

articles.description: Jamaica qualify for the knockout stages of the Women's World Cup for the first time as Brazil crash out early.
articles.title: Jamaica earn last-16 debut as Brazil and Marta go out

articles.description: Britain's Emma Raducanu returns to the practice court for the first time since undergoing wrist and ankle surgery in May.
articles.title: Raducanu back on court for first time since surgery

articles.description: Presenter Chris Hughes has been told by the BBC that a comment he made to Australian Maitlan Brown during The Hundred was "not appropriate".
articles.title: Hughes told Barbie comment 'not appropriate' by BBC
